[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/arkworks/shamir.rs] [Struct: ShamirThresholdConfig] [Skipped domain field] Since domain is marked with #[serde(skip)], can serialization/deserialization cycles create configs with mismatched n and domain size? (High)
